_sText:
Mg_ski_jumps_v2 public beta is a NEW GAME MODE IN Counter-Strike: Source.

I have made it for FUN, more experience in creating map for Source Engine and... make better the world's 1st game - Counter-Strike: Source!


HOW TO PLAY?

Ski and jump, when flying collect "colored lights" to speed up = better distance = better score = better frags;

BOTS ARE WORKING AT THIS MAP! (90% - sometimes any bot stuck)


Features:
- Very advanced trigger system:
- Queue system
- Automatic player moving from Landing point to Queue
- Scoring system (good landing distances = good frags)

- Good lighting at map
- LOT OF FUN :-)
- NEW GAME MODE - SKI JUMPING!
- Many more... ;-)

Thanks to "Robin" for the sleight prefab.

v2 Version:
!- Restart round system (for join new players from spectator)
- Map size is up to 2x

<object width="360" height="340"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/2gSUCd023BQ&hl=pl&fs=1&"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/2gSUCd023BQ&hl=pl&fs=1&" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="360" height="340"></embed></object>

Thanks for playing :-)
